Content:: Handunnetti Rannulu Piyasiri (known as H. R. Piyasiri) was a Member of Parliament[1] and a member of the Southern Province Council. He is also the current Sri Lankan Ambassador in Myanmar. He was the State Minister of Labor and Vocational Training and was also one time Chairman of Lotteries Board. He was educated at Nalanda College Colombo. While at school he played for First XI cricket team in 1960 that was captained by Gamini Jayawickrama Perera.
Title: H. R. Piyasiri - Wikipedia
